ColumnFormatting.basic: When calling CreateAndOpenSheet, pass IList<Column> as second parameter. Each element represents a single column. Only the CustomWidth, Width and Hidden are used.
ColumnFormatting.width: Width represents the column width in characters (Same unit as when resizing in Excel).

HideSheet.basic: CreateAndOpenSheet accepts as third parameter a SheetStateValues variable.
HideSheet.VeryHidden: SheetStateValues.VeryHidden: Sheet is hidden and cannot be unhidden from Excel's UI

MergeCells.basic: In order to merge a range of cells while a sheet is open, use MergeCells with a range.

Styling.basic: First, the elements that define a style (font, fill, border and, optionally, numbering format) must be created.
Styling.insert: After that, a new style list can be created and new styles inserted. Remember to name you styles.
Styling.useName: When instantiating BigExcelWriter, use the result of calling GetStylesheet as the stylesheet parameter. Then, when writing a cell, you can use the name given earlier to format it.

note.p1: If you're planning to use {{projects.BigExcelCreator.Conditional Formatting}}, you must also create differential styles here. To do so, follow the same instructions as above, replacing NewStyle with NewDifferentialStyle.
note.p2: All parameters of NewDifferentialStyle are optional, except name. Of the optional parameters, at least one must be present.
